title: Man arrested outside Buckingham Palace days before coronation of King Charles III
description: Police outside Buckingham Palace say they arrested a man after he threw a number of items suspected to be shotgun cartridges into the palace grounds. Officers also carried out a controlled explosion of the suspect’s suspicious bag. NBC News’ Kelly Cobiella has more details on the incident that comes just days before the coronation of King Charles III.

title: Man with knife arrested outside Buckingham Palace days ahead of coronation
description: A man with a knife who threw what appeared to be shotgun cartridges onto the grounds of Buckingham Palace was arrested Tuesday, just days ahead of the coronation of King Charles III, officials said.

title: Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney celebrate Wrexham soccer triumph
description: Hollywood stars and Wrexham AFC owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney joined players and staff from the Welsh soccer club on an open-top bus victory parade, celebrating the men’s team winning promotion to the English Football League and the women’s side moving up to the highest level of competition in Wales.

title: Ugandan lawmakers pass new version of tough anti-gay bill
description: The new law prescribes the death penalty for “aggravated homosexuality,” which includes cases of sexual relations involving people living with HIV.

title: Bolivia launches investigation of Spanish priest accused of abuse
description: Top Bolivian prosecutor launched an investigation into a late Spanish priest who allegedly abused several minors in Bolivia dating back to the 1980s.

title: Prominent Palestinian hunger striker dies in Israeli custody
description: Palestinian prisoner Khader Adnan died in Israeli custody on Tuesday after a nearly three-month hunger strike, Israel’s prison service announced.

title: Take a look back at the 1953 coronation of Queen Elizabeth II
description: Historian Alice Loxton contrasts the coronation in 1953 of Britain's Queen Elizabeth II with the crowning of her son, King Charles III.

title: The 'stunning' scale of Russian deaths in Ukraine signals trouble ahead for Putin
description: Russian forces have suffered 100,000 casualties, including more than 20,000 killed, in Ukraine since December, the White House said Monday. President Vladimir Putin's depleted forces are facing an impending counteroffensive.

title: Coronation of King Charles III raises questions about the future of the monarchy
description: As King Charles III prepared to be crowned, NBC News' Savannah Guthrie gathered opinions about the future of Britain's monarchy.

title: Coronation of King Charles III puts the focus on the younger royals
description: NBC News' Keir Simmons considered the British royal dynasty as King Charles III prepared for his coronation.

title: 'Dancing king' dolls are popular souvenirs for the coronation of Charles III
description: The coronation of King Charles III is expected to give a huge boost to London's tourism industry and the thousands of businesses producing royal memorabilia.

title: China's exit bans multiply as political control tightens under Xi
description: China is increasingly barring people from leaving the country, including foreign executives, a jarring message as the authorities say the country is open for business after three years of tight Covid restrictions.

title: An American dies while climbing Mount Everest
description: An American citizen died in Nepal on Monday while climbing Mount Everest, officials said.

title: 800,000 people could be forced to flee Sudan conflict, U.N. says
description: The conflict in Sudan could force 800,000 people to flee the country, the United Nations warned Monday, as battles between rival military factions persisted in the capital despite a supposed cease-fire.

title: U.S. journalist imprisoned in Russia 'deeply touched' by letter-writing campaign
description: Colleagues and friends of Evan Gershkovich, the Wall Street Journal correspondent detained in Russia, have launched a letter-writing campaign to keep his spirits high.

title: Australia to ban recreational vaping in e-cigarette crackdown
description: Australia said it will ban recreational vaping and tighten other e-cigarette laws in the biggest crackdown on the tobacco industry in more than a decade.
